protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 2% sodium hypochlorite and 0.01% triton X-100 for 5 min followed by rinsing in sterile water for 5 times. Seeds were then suspended in 0.1% agar solution and dispensed on 0.8% agar-gelled MS medium containing 2% sucrose. Plates were sealed and shifted to cold room for 72 h to break dormancy and facilitate uniform germination and then transferred to culture room under continuous illumination.
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix).
